mapper.select: WITH MANUAL AS ( SELECT lcm.MANUAL_IDX , lcm.REG_YN , lm.* FROM lab_cook_manual lcm , lab_menu lm WHERE 1 = 1 AND lcm.MENU_IDX = lm.MENU_IDX AND lm.DOC_OWNER = #{userId} ) SELECT count(man.MANUAL_IDX) AS cnt FROM MANUAL man WHERE 1 = 1 AND man.IS_DELETE = 'N' AND man.IS_LAST = 'Y'

WITH MANUAL AS ( SELECT lcm.MANUAL_IDX , lcm.REG_YN , lm.* FROM lab_cook_manual lcm , lab_menu lm WHERE 1 = 1 AND lcm.MENU_IDX = lm.MENU_IDX AND lm.DOC_OWNER = #{userId} ) SELECT * , CASE WHEN man.REG_YN = 'Y' THEN '등록완료' ELSE '미등록' END as REG_YN_TXT , (SELECT CATEGORY_NAME FROM lab_system_category WHERE 1 = 1 AND CATEGORY_IDX = man.MENU_TYPE1) as CATEGORY_NAME1 , (SELECT CATEGORY_NAME FROM lab_system_category WHERE 1 = 1 AND CATEGORY_IDX = man.MENU_TYPE2) as CATEGORY_NAME2 , (SELECT CATEGORY_NAME FROM lab_system_category WHERE 1 = 1 AND CATEGORY_IDX = man.MENU_TYPE3) as CATEGORY_NAME3 , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lab_menu WHERE 1 = 1 AND MENU_CODE = man.MENU_CODE AND IS_LAST = 'N' AND VERSION_NO < man.VERSION_NO AND IS_DELETE = 'N' ) as CHILD_CNT , FN_GET_USER_NAME(DOC_OWNER) as DOC_USER_NAME FROM MANUAL man WHERE 1 = 1 AND DOC_NO in ( SELECT tmp.DOC_NO FROM ( SELECT row_number() over (order by manaual.MENU_IDX DESC) as rnum , manaual.* FROM MANUAL manaual WHERE 1 = 1 AND manaual.IS_DELETE = 'N' AND manaual.IS_LAST = 'Y' )tmp WHERE rnum between #{startRow} AND #{endRow} ) ORDER BY man.DOC_NO DESC, man.MENU_IDX DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE lab_cook_manual SET REG_YN = 'Y' , REG_DATE = sysdate() WHERE 1 = 1 AND MANUAL_IDX = #{idx}
mapper.select: SELECT FILE_IDX , DOC_IDX , DOC_TYPE , FILE_TYPE , FILE_NAME , ORG_FILE_NAME , FILE_PATH , REG_DATE , FILE_CONTENT FROM lab_file WHERE 1 = 1 AND DOC_IDX = #{idx} AND DOC_TYPE = #{docType}
